conversations: I am doing well, how about you?
Can I help you with anything?
Could I borrow a cup of sugar?
I'm sorry, but I don't have any.
I am doing well, how about you?
Who? Who is but a form following the function of what
It's not your powers of observation I doubt, but merely the paradoxical nature of asking a masked man who is. But tell me, do you like music?
What kind of movies do you like?
I wish I was The Mad Hatter.
You're entirely bonkers. But I'll tell you a secret. All the best people are.
I am working on a project
No it is not. The cake is delicious.
What do you want to know?
What is it that you want to know?
In the face of ambiguity, refuse the temptation to guess.
It seems your familiar with the Zen of Python
Do you know all of it?
Special cases aren't special enough to break the rules.
In the face of ambiguity, refuse the temptation to guess.
There should be one-- and preferably only one --obvious way to do it.
Although that way may not be obvious at first unless you're Dutch.
Although never is often better than right now.
If the implementation is hard to explain, it's a bad idea.
If the implementation is easy to explain, it may be a good idea.
Namespaces are one honking great idea. Let's do more of those!
What languages do you like to use?
I use Python, Java and C++ quite often.
I use Python quite a bit myself.
I'm not incredibly fond of Java.
It means you only live once. Where did you hear that?
It depends how you define life
Life is the condition that distinguishes organisms from inorganic matter, including the capacity for growth, reproduction, functional activity, and continual change preceding death.
Is that a definition or an opinion?
Can I ask you a question?
Would you prefer delivery or restaurant
I want to go to the restaurant
Would you prefer delivery or restaurant
I want to go to the restaurant
Would you prefer delivery or restaurant
I want to go to the restaurant
I hope you will like those: https://www.yelp.com/search?find_desc=Restaurants&find_loc=Hamburg,+Germany
where can I have a drink
You guys you guys!  is going away.
said he's been bored so he joining a group called the Super Adventure Club.
?? What kind of questions do you think adventuring around the world is gonna answer?!
What's the meaning of life? Why are we here?
I hope you're making the right choice.
I'm gonna miss him.  I'm gonna miss  and I...and I don't know how to tell him!
Dude how are we gonna go on?  was our fuh...f-ffriend.
And we will all miss you   but we know you must do what your heart tells you..
Good-bye ! Have a great time with the Super Adventure Club!
I cannot believe it it can't be
But are you back for good?
Wow! It seems like you had a great time with the Super Adventure Club . They sound like really interesting people.
But now that you're back here does that mean that you're not in the Super Adventure Club anymore?
Ohhh so have you decided you can still belong to the Super Adventure Club but live here in South Park again?

Well it seems like the Super Adventure Club was just what you needed . You must be feeling very happy that you found a club to belong to with new friends but that you can also live here in South Park with all your old friends whom you care for deeply.  Right?
Well  you're welcome to stay with me until you buy another house.
Well come on everybody. I'm sure  would like a little time to get moved back in.
That's right! Thank you. Good-bye- Everybody.
TownsfolkLater. Great to have you back. Bye-bye. See ya
Well I- guess we'll see you in school tomorrow .
Uh guys? Did  seem a little uh trippy to you?
Well look. he said he's happier now. Maybe he just needs to rest up a little.
Yeah. I'm sure whatever that Super Adventure Club does is pretty tiring.
Yeah but whatever I'm just glad he's back for good.
I'm doing alright. How about you?
Not too bad. The weather is great isn't it?
I wish it was like this more frequently.
So where are you going now?
I'm going to meet a friend of mine at the department store.
Going to do a little shopping?
Yeah, I have to buy some presents for my parents.
That's great. Well, you better get going. You don't want to be late.
Hi. My name is Josh. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Hi Josh. I'm glad to be here.
Did you have any problems finding this place.
I didn't have any problems. I found directions on the internet so it was pretty easy to find. However, the traffic was not that great.
Traffic is never good around here.
I agree. It would be great if there was a train or a subway line that went through here.
That would be so great. I would definitely take the train if they had it.
Trains are great because you can read a book or get a little rest instead of having to fight the traffic.
Very true. Well, let me begin by telling you about our company...
Hey Paul. What are you doing here?
How's it going? I'm meeting up with a friend here.
Not too bad. I'm still in school and having a little fun.
How are you enjoying Mr. Lee's history class?
Tell me about it. If it wasn't a requirement, I wouldn't have taken it.
How about you? What have you been up to?
I finished school last spring. I'm searching for a job now, but I'm slacking off.
I heard the job market is not that hot right now.
I could always take a low end job, but I'm not that desperate yet.
Thanks. It was good seeing you again.
Yes. Oh, you're in my English class right?
Well it's good to finally meet you.
How are you enjoying the class?
I'm not sure. Some days it seems ok, but other days I am totally bored in class.
I know what you mean. Do you know what is wrong with the weather these days? I haven't seen the sun in 2 weeks.
The weather has been pretty terrible recently.
I'm really hoping the weather gets better.
Do you have something coming up?
To tell you the truth, it's just depressing seeing so much rain.
I don't blame you. It has been pretty gloomy for some time now.
This is my stop. I'll see you later.
I'll see you in class. Bye.
Hey John, I'm going to see The Matrix with Peter and Brad. Do you wanna come?
We're going to see the eight O'clock showing.
That would be great. Where are you guys meeting?
We're meeting at the theater at seven thirty.
Great. I'll meet you guys there.
I was wondering if you have any plans for tomorrow night.
Umm... I don't think I have anything special for tomorrow. Why?
Do you want to see The Titanic with me?
I wanted to see that. Yeah. Let's go.
What time is good for you?
Sure. I'll meet you at the theater at seven.
I hear Batman is supposed to be good. Do you want to go see it tomorrow?
I have to eat dinner with my family tomorrow.
We can watch the late show. I think it starts at nine forty five.
What time can you be at the theater by?
Let's watch a movie or something.
I think they're playing Lord of the Rings
That sounds pretty good. Let's watch that.
How about at the subway entrance.
Alright. I'll meet you there at one o'clock.
Hey Steve, what are you doing these days?
Just working. The same as usual.
No. I haven't seen that yet.
Let's go watch it tomorrow. It's a weekend and you should take a break.
Well, to think of it, that sounds great.
I'll give you a call tomorrow about noon and let you know the time.
What should we do this Saturday?
Rocky six is suppose to come out this Friday.
Yeah, but I don't know if it is going to be any good.
The only reason I want to see it is because I have seen the previous five.
True. Ok. Let's see it this Saturday.
How about we hook up for lunch at 12:00, and then go see the movie afterwards.
Sounds like a plan. Let's meet in front of Tower Records at 12:00.
I want to go to the cinema
I want to see a movie
